tool.name: Beta diversity by type
tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
**WARNING**. This tool requires two types of files: **Otuphyl file** get in *Compute otuphyl* and **metadata.tsv file**.\
.. class:: infomark
**What is beta diversity?**\
Beta diversity is the difference of diversity between two or more samples.
**Example**
.. image:: ${static_path}/images/iontorrent/beta_diversity.png :height: 700 :width: 800

beta diversity. (2021). Oxford Reference. https://www.oxfordreference.com/view/10.1093/oi/authority.20110803095502385
